application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to ref: 21/04804/FUL: external finishing materials (3), hard and soft landscaping (4), enclosure (5), SuDs (6), Construction Management Plan (7), Arboricultural Method Statement (8), cycle parking (9), refuse storage and recycling (10), potable water (11), green roof/wall (14), footway/vehicular Crossover (15), for the redevelopment of site involving demolition of Nos.63 & 65 Bramley Road, construction of a new road and erection of 8Nos. single family dwellings with associated landscaping, amenity space, bin storage and cycle parking.
site_name: 63 And 65 And Rear Of 59-65 Bramley RoadLondonN14 4HA
